name: Junk 2
description:
Junk 2 is an arcade shooter that is a sequel to Junk made for the Indie Galactic Space Jam 2021. Where you play as an astronaut collecting Space Junk by shooting gas to push Space Junk into a net to clean space, which is the Single Player of Junk 2. Junk 2 also has Multiplayer with three modes. The First Mode is called High Score where you and another player compete to collect as much junk as possible before the time runs out. The Second Mode is called Kill where you and another player battle to the death and that last one standing wins. And the third mode is called Low Score where you and another player compete to collect the least amount of junk before the time runs out.

Controls:

Single Player:                                                   General:                                       

WASD: Move                                                 Esc: Pause                               

Enter: Shoot                                                                                                       

     

Multiplayer:

Player 1:                                                              Player 2:

WASD: Move                                                   Arrow Keys: Move

F: Shoot                                                               Ctrl: Shoot

Credits:

Nicholas Walton: Game Design, Programming, Art, Animation, and Music.

Clickteam: SFXs

Special Thanks: Indienomicon, Jeremiah Garcia, Brian Wallace, Luluca F. Walton, and Alex Walton

I hope you enjoy Junk 2 and I hope you look forward to my future games and don't forget to comment and review!
